name: the Early Worm
description:
The early bird gets the worm.
but the early worm gets eaten.

Can you make it to the hungry bird before it dies of starvation?

Controls:

  • Use the arrow keys (or WASD) to move the inch worms tail.
  • Hold the SPACE bar to switch to controlling the head
  • Try swinging back and force to build momentum. This helps when turning.
  • good luck!

Credits:
